title: This Kid's Cover Of KUBLAI KHAN TX Is Excellent, But His Brother Steals The Show
description: All hail the pit moves. The post This Kid's Cover Of KUBLAI KHAN TX Is Excellent, But His Brother Steals The Show appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
text: Let me get this out of the way right up top – this kid who goes by the name Bubble CCTX kicks ass. His YouTube channel is loaded with killer covers of songs from Slipknot, Gojira, Whitechapel, and more, all of which you can check out here. But his recent cover of Kublai Khan TX's "Self-Destruct" is making the rounds for entirely different reasons. Watch as this kid crushes "Self-Destruct" on guitar while (I assume) his brother shows off the sickest pit moves known to man in the background. It's only a matter of time until dudes are out there pirouetting in the pit. Want More Metal? html:
Let me get this out of the way right up top – this kid who goes by the name Bubble CCTX kicks ass. His YouTube channel is loaded with killer covers of songs from Slipknot, Gojira, Whitechapel, and more, all of which you can check out here. But his recent cover of Kublai Khan TX's "Self-Destruct" is making the rounds for entirely different reasons.

Watch as this kid crushes "Self-Destruct" on guitar while (I assume) his brother shows off the sickest pit moves known to man in the background. It's only a matter of time until dudes are out there pirouetting in the pit.
